attributes.action: Ensure that all registered care homes are created by Full Planning Permission considered by elected councillors at Planning Application Sub Committee level
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently care homes to be registered with the Commission for Social Care Inspection (CSCI) are commonly created using Certificates of Lawfulness which bypass planning considerations and are decided under delegated powers without publicity. The use of this loophole has in some boroughs become the norm in the last ten years and leads to an impoverished care service where service users are placed at risk.
